title: Understanding Edit Mode
text: Edit mode allows you to make changes directly within a cell. This is useful for correcting errors without re-entering the entire data.

title: Activating Edit Mode
text: To enter edit mode, you can double-click the cell you want to edit. This will allow you to make changes directly in the cell.

hintAnswer: $$double-click$$ the cell, then make corrections by inserting new characters between two characters
title: Correcting Errors in Edit Mode
text: Once in edit mode, you can insert new characters between existing ones to correct errors.
choices: $$double-click$$ the cell, then make corrections by inserting new characters between two characters
click "data edit mode" then choose edits
